name: Nehul Frame
desc: A massive world supply and maintenance depot, the Nehul Frame serves as a critical hub for interstellar fleets, offering refueling, repairs, and resupply. Its presence significantly boosts a colony's accessibility, attracting traders, explorers, and military vessels alike. A beacon of commerce and logistics in the void.

name: Dzianis Outpost
desc: A fortified nexus of power and negotiation, the Dzianis Outpost serves as both a center for interstellar diplomacy and a heavily armed military bastion. Its dual role allows it to broker peace through dialogue or enforce stability with devastating firepower. Equipped with elite forces and advanced weaponry, it stands as a symbol of calculated authority in the void.

name: Argent Uplink Node
desc: A massive subspace antenna that connects the colonys manufacturing grids directly to the Argent Concordats processing core. This real-time AI oversight drastically improves ship production quality and fleet coordination. Requires Heavy Machinery to maintain the connection.

name: Dyson Control Hub
desc: The neural center of the Seraphina Dyson Swarm. It harvests the blue giant's raw fury to provide infinite energy and absolute order. Its advanced AI firewalls render the colony invisible to the Luddic Path.
